Package classes

Class Game

java.lang.Object
javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
classes.Game
public class Game extends javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
Main game class managing game logic, animations, and event handling. It extends AnimationTimer in order to execute a game loop.

  • Method Details

    • handle

      public void handle(long time)
      Overriding the handle method of the AnimationTimer class. It is called on every frame of the animation.
      Specified by:
      handle in class javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
      Parameters:
      time - the elapsed time since the last call in nanoseconds
